CacheService
service in module npn-viz-tool

Description

Simple service that can be used to store content for a period of time to avoid needing to return to the server for it.

Methods

  • dump()

    Dump the contents of the cache the log (for debug purposes).

  • get(key)

    Fetch an object from the cache.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    keystring

    The cache key of the object to fetch.

    Returns
    object

    The object in the cache if still valid or null if not found or expired.

  • keyFromObject(obj)

    Generates a unique key (md5 hash) based on an object that can be used as a cache key.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    objobject

    A JavaScript object to generate a key from.

    Returns
    string

    A unique key that can be used to cache/retrieve something from the cache.

  • put(key, obj, ttl)

    Place an object in the cache. The default time to live for an object in the cache is 5 minutes.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    keystring

    The cache key to store the object under.

    objobject

    The object to cache. If null will drop the key from the cache if it exists.

    ttlint

    Optional argument that specifies how long in milliseconds the object should remained cached. A negative value means the object won't expire.
